name: One Day At A Time
chorusText:
1 OF 4
SHOW ME THE STAIRWAYTHAT I HAVE TO CLIMBLORD FOR MY SAKETEACH ME TO TAKE ONE DAY AT A TIME
2 OF 4
ONE DAY AT A TIME, SWEET JESUSTHAT’S ALL I’M ASKING FROM YOUJUST GIVE ME THE STRENGHTTO DO EVERYDAY WHAT I HAVE TO DOYESTERDAY IS GONE, SWEET JESUSAND TOMORROW MAY NEVER BE MINE,SO LORD FOR MY SAKETEACH ME TO TAKEONE DAY AT A TIME
3 OF 4
DO YOU REMEMBERWHEN YOU WALKED AMONG MENWELL, JESUS YOU KNOWIF YOU’RE LOOKING BELOWIT’S WORSE NOW THAN THENPUSHING AND SHOVINGAND CROUDING MY MINDSO, LORD FOR MY SAKE TEACH ME TO TAKEONE DAY AT A TIME
4 OF 4
